imdb.title: Africa no Salaryman
imdb.plot: The comedy follows a lion, toucan, and lizard as they live the lives of office workers in a capitalist society in Japan, while also dealing with their unique situations as animals living beyond the savanna and the food chain.

episodes.title: Africa no Chikan / Africa no Donuts-ya / Africa no Megane / Africa no Goukon / Africa no JK: Shishi Mura / Africa no JK: Gorimi
episodes.plot: Rowdy Toucan tries public transport. Lizard spies a special treat at a donut shop. Lion terrifies the junior employees. Toucan's mixer goes sideways.

episodes.title: Africa Corporate Drone
episodes.plot: Lion starts a diet. The coworkers discuss repurposing lightly used bathwater. Toucan has relationship issues. The CEO announces a rare cryptid search.

episodes.title: Africa Flower-Viewing Parties
episodes.plot: Lizard wants to learn a party trick to impress clients. Toucan is sent to reserve the company's flower-viewing spot. Lion and Lizard mourn a coworker.

episodes.title: Africa Mascot Characters
episodes.plot: Lion visits the dentist for severe tooth pain. Tasked with creating a company mascot, the three coworkers touch base with old friends for research.

episodes.title: Africa Job Search
episodes.plot: The company holds its 36th meeting on cost reduction with Big Cat, Lizard and other members of the board. Toucan, however, gets into an unfortunate accident.

episodes.title: Africa Nasty Coworker
episodes.plot: Toucan is tasked with taking work to Granny. Toucan is excited for summer vacation, but Lizard has some bad news. A nasty coworker is pulling pranks in the office and Toucan decides to take justice into his own hands.

episodes.title: Africa Company Trip
episodes.plot: The employees leave on a relaxing company trip to Hawaii, where they see the sights--and Toucan meets an old friend with big plans to strike it rich.

episodes.title: Africa Post-Vacation
episodes.plot: Readjusting to work post-vacation is harder than it looks. Toucan tries a new trick for escaping a bad date. Lizard has concerns about a new hire.

episodes.title: Africa Loan Sharks
episodes.plot: A shady lender offers Honeyguide a more permanent solution to his money problems, while Caracal, Lion, and Ratel attend a sketchy speed-dating event.

episodes.title: Africa Play-by-Play Commentator
episodes.plot: It's time for the employees to have their annual physicals, and Lion is holding everyone up. Crane draws from his life to pursue fame as a YouTuber.

episodes.title: Africa Salaryman
episodes.plot: Lion, Lizard, and Toucan are up against some formidable rivals as they put all they have into a presentation to wow a client and win a big project.
